articles.title: Video: Wolf Blitzer presses Saudi diplomat who was in meeting with Biden on Khashoggi's murder - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN's Wolf Blitzer presses Saudi diplomat Adel al-Jubeir, who was in the room during President Joe Biden's meeting with Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed Bin Salman, about the murder of journalist Jamal Khashoggi.

articles.title: Video: Former police commissioner reacts to Uvalde surveillance footage - CNN Video
articles.description: Former Philadelphia Police Commissioner Charles Ramsey reacts after watching the full 77-minute surveillance footage of the Robb Elementary school shooting in Uvalde, Texas.

articles.author: Zachary Cohen, Ryan Nobles and Annie Grayer, CNN
articles.title: January 6 committee subpoenas Secret Service for records
articles.description: The House select committee investigating January 6, 2021, has issued a subpoena to the US Secret Service, marking the first time the panel has publicly done so for an executive branch agency.
articles.content:
(CNN)The House select committee investigating January 6, 2021, has issued a subpoena to the US Secret Service, marking the first time the panel has publicly done so for an executive branch agency.

articles.author: Andrew Millman
articles.title: Former Overstock CEO testifies to January 6 committee for nearly 8 hours
articles.description: Former Overstock CEO Patrick Byrne, an ally of former President Donald Trump, testified behind closed doors before the House select committee investigating January 6, 2021, for nearly eight hours on Friday.

articles.author: Artemis Moshtaghian and Kate Bennett, CNN
articles.title: Ivana Trump's death ruled accidental by medical examiner
articles.description: Ivana Trump, an ex-wife of former President Donald Trump, died of "blunt impact injuries" to the torso, New York City's medical examiner said Friday.
articles.content:
(CNN)Ivana Trump, an ex-wife of former President Donald Trump, died of "blunt impact injuries" to the torso, New York City's medical examiner said Friday.

articles.author: Katelyn Polantz, CNN Reporter, Crime and Justice
articles.title: John Eastman loses emergency request to protect his phone data from DOJ investigators
articles.description: A federal judge in New Mexico won't step in to protect Trump attorney John Eastman's seized cell phone from Justice Department investigators, after Eastman was searched as part of a January 6-related criminal inquiry.

articles.title: Steve Bannon's 'War Room' footage shows spread of conspiracy theories ahead of January 6th - CNN Video
articles.description: Steve Bannon, who was intricately involved in planning challenges to the 2020 election, faces contempt of Congress charges on Monday after failing to cooperate with the January 6th committee. CNN's Drew Griffin provides insight to the key role Bannon played i…

articles.title: Video: Michael Cohen says Trump is 'melting down' - CNN Video
articles.description: Michael Cohen, former President Donald Trump's one-time personal lawyer, says that Trump's reported call to a January 6 committee witness signals to him that Trump is 'melting down'.

articles.author: Melanie Zanona, Gabby Orr and Zachary Cohen, CNN
articles.title: House GOP plots investigative revenge on January 6 panel
articles.description: House Republicans are plotting revenge on the select committee investigating the January 6, 2021, insurrection, as the GOP weighs a broader effort to re-litigate some of Donald Trump's biggest election grievances if it recaptures the House majority.
